name: Philly McFwog's Potion Shop
description:
Description:

Play as Philly McFwog, a peasant potion seller just trying to get by.  In this game you can:

  • Craft potions through many ingredients
  • Service customers want they want, or something else entirely
  • Upgrade your abilities each day to assist in potion selling
  • Pay rent!

Controls:

  • E to eat the item in your hand
  • Left mouse click to interact
